thread.title: David Bottomley
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by David Bottomley

author: David Bottomley
title: David Bottomley
text: Hands down Warrior Trading is the best Day Trading instruction available. Ross and the W.T. team are 100% committed to my success. I feel great about my experience with Warrior Trading. The W.T. Team is responsive and they never fail to answer my questions promptly or refer me to the applicable lessons/training videos. There is allot to learn and having so many resources under one umbrella is really awesome. Between the On Line Chat Room, Lessons and Mentor Sessions Warrior Trading covers all the bases. Many thanks to Ross, Mike and Jeff for all your hard work, professional instruction and constant assistance!
